fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- No factional kill
- No factional chat
- Has a mechanic called stress. Each player (including non-Estate) starts at 0 stress.
- At 10 stress, a player will have a heart attack and die.
- Players gain 1 stress whenever visited by a member of a faction that’s not their own.
- Players gain 5 stress if they’re attacked and survive.
